name: Family Meetings
description: Virtual Family Meetings Every Tuesday 8:00-9:00pm Everyone is welcome Family Meetings are a time of nurturing, reinforcement, motivation and renewal. Alumni serve as role models and mentors who share their “before and after” stories and the results of following the Alive & Free violence prevention prescription. Current challenges are discussed and youth are shown how to apply the “Rules for Living” and provided counseling.

howToGetIt: For more information call 415-826-8664 or send email to admin@stayaliveandfree.org
